nodes.text: The Consular-class Armed Cruiser was a class of cruiser that was utilized by the Galactic Republic's diplomatic service branch of the Coruscant Guard. One such vessel transported a garrison of clone shock troopers alongside a group of specialized LAAT/i gunships led by Clone Commander Thorn to the planet Scipio, in order to provide security for Republic Senator Padmé Amidala. The vessel was destroyed in the Separatist Alliance invasion of Scipio, and the remaining force was annihilated.
